short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you a way to comment

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OnMyMindDaily.com - Comment on any website you visit online. Many websites fail to offer comment sections. The OnMyMindDaily extension will post anything on your mind on onmyminddaily.com and it will be published for the world to see.
